mapper.select: select ORDERID, CORPID, TRADEID, GROUPID, BUYERID, CUSTOMERID, CUSTOMERTEL1, CUSTOMERTEL2, CUSTOMEREMAIL, CUSTOMERCOUNTRY, CUSTOMERCOUNTRYCN, CUSTOMERCOUNTRYJC, CUSTOMERPROVINCE, CUSTOMERCITY, CUSTOMERZIPCODE, CUSTOMERRESERVE1, CUSTOMERRESERVE2, CUSTOMERRESERVE3, CUSTOMERRESERVE4, CUSTOMERRESERVE5, SHOPTYPEID, SHOPTYPE, MONEYTYPE, MONEYRATE, ORIGINORDERMONEY, ORDERMONEY, COSTMONEY, ORIGINEXPRESSMONEY, EXPRESSMONEY, STATUS, POSTAGESERVICE, ORDERTIME, CREATETIME, OPER, OPERTIME, SELLOPER, OPENFLAG, MESSAGECOUNT, UPDATEFLAG, UPDATETIME, FLAG, FLAGDESCR, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, CUSTOMERNAME, CUSTOMERADDRESS, SKU, PRODUCT, CONTENT, NOTEINFO, MESSAGECONTENT, UPDATEDESCR from db_smtneworder where ORDERID = #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ORDERID, CORPID, TRADEID, GROUPID, BUYERID, CUSTOMERID, CUSTOMERTEL1, CUSTOMERTEL2, CUSTOMEREMAIL, CUSTOMERCOUNTRY, CUSTOMERCOUNTRYCN, CUSTOMERCOUNTRYJC, CUSTOMERPROVINCE, CUSTOMERCITY, CUSTOMERZIPCODE, CUSTOMERRESERVE1, CUSTOMERRESERVE2, CUSTOMERRESERVE3, CUSTOMERRESERVE4, CUSTOMERRESERVE5, SHOPTYPEID, SHOPTYPE, MONEYTYPE, MONEYRATE, ORIGINORDERMONEY, ORDERMONEY, COSTMONEY, ORIGINEXPRESSMONEY, EXPRESSMONEY, STATUS, POSTAGESERVICE, ORDERTIME, CREATETIME, OPER, OPERTIME, SELLOPER, OPENFLAG, MESSAGECOUNT, UPDATEFLAG, UPDATETIME, FLAG, FLAGDESCR, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, CUSTOMERNAME, CUSTOMERADDRESS, SKU, PRODUCT, CONTENT, NOTEINFO, MESSAGECONTENT, UPDATEDESCR from db_smtneworder

TRADEID = #{tradeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and

FLAGDESCR = #{flagdescr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and

SKU = #{sku,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and

NOTEINFO = #{noteinfo,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
MESSAGECONTENT = #{messagecontent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
UPDATEDESCR = #{updatedescr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}
and 1=1
